posts.title: Random-Stuff App
posts.description: An application that sells random goods using the Fake store API and uses midtrans as payment and the RajaOngkir API to find out the shipping price from the city to be addressed

posts.title: Bread It ! (CMS-Admin Site)
posts.description: an application that consists of a cms and a user, in the cms-site there is a CRUD feature where we are in the position of admin on the cms web, and on the user-site we can see a list of products displayed on the landing page and we can see the details of the products being sold

posts.title: Bread It ! (Client Site)
posts.description: an application that consists of a cms and a user, in the cms-site there is a CRUD feature where we are in the position of admin on the cms web, and on the user-site we can see a list of products displayed on the landing page and we can see the details of the products being sold
